posts.post_content:
Does anyone remember a relatively old PC game named Impossible Creatures? It was a strategy game in which you had to combine different creatures (like, say, a Hippo and a Chameleon) and send the ramming into the enemy's ones.  
Because the Simic creatures from RTR block look like they came straight from that game.
